attributes.comment:
These fees not only affect immigrants coming into the United States from other
counties, but they also affect U.S. citizens seeking to adopt internationally. I do
not agree with the increase as international adoption is very expensive. The
proposed increase is outrageous! I think a 4-5% increase would be acceptable
only if the length of the application and biometrics is extended. We currently have
to pay for the biometrics again because our finger prints will expire prior to us
bringing our son home. The application and biometrics should both be a minimum
of 18 months, 24 months would be even better considering the adoption process
can be a lengthy one.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kris Drexler
